title: almost Univers but not quite...
content:
Hi folks,

Can anyone ID this face for me? It's so close to Univers it's untrue, but the source has elements that are slightly squarer.

Thanks in advance!

Kenny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829150636im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sumitomo-01_5204.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sumitomo-01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829150636/http:/typophile.com/files/sumitomo-01.jpg) | 289.93 KB |
author: kenny.razzell

comments.content: Pretty close, but in my opinion it is handwork. The /T is too wide in proportion to other characters; also note the distortion at the right bottom curve of the /S. Note that upper and lower rounded characters do not extend above and below the baseline.
Totally agree, George. That could definitely be hand-done... Could also be the way this graphic has been produced...
